      • getPost

        public FacebookPost getPost(java.lang.String id)
        Retrieves a facebook post, using its id. Post IDs are generally formatted as "12345678901234567_12345678901234567", where the left side of the _ is the id of the author, and the right side is the actual post identifier.
        Specified by:
        getPost in interface SocialMediaAPI<FacebookUser,FacebookPost>
        Specified by:
        getPost in class FacebookAPI
        Parameters:
        id - Full id of the post.
        Returns:
        A post filled in will all visible information

      • likePost

        public boolean likePost(java.lang.String id)
        Description copied from interface: SocialMediaAPI
        Likes a post. Currently, Facebook only allows for pages liking posts and comments on itself or other pages. User likes can not be managed through the API.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the post
        Returns:
        true if successful

      • unlikePost

        public boolean unlikePost(java.lang.String id)
        Description copied from interface: SocialMediaAPI
        Unlikes a post. Currently, Facebook only allows for pages liking posts and comments on itself or other pages. User likes can not be managed through the API.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the post
        Returns:
        true if successful
